author: Andrew Pederson
text: Looking for example policies of communities that have have transitioned from more traditional leave programs to paid time off systems.  Looking for policies, fiscal analysis info, and any staff elated communications or processes utilized for implementation.
title: Transitioning to Paid Time Off Systems
